DefaultReaderConfiguration.fullDescription: Collects events from Postfix Mail Server.

file.toolTipText: Directory or path to read from

string.toolTipText: Hostname of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

integer.toolTipText: Port number of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

select.toolTipText: Data routing (normalized alerts to Manager and/or raw data to nDepth)

integer.toolTipText: Number of seconds between log reads

FastFormatter.condition: Illegal address syntax from unknown\[([.\d]+)\] in (\S+) command: (\S+).*
FastFormatter.format: Illegal address syntax from "$7" in $8 command "$9"

FastPattern.description: ServiceInfo postfix/smtpd? 5 no_queue_id; rule; Host offered
FastPattern.pattern: postfix/smtpd?\[\d+\]: .*(?:no_queue_id|\S+: [-\w]+ rule=\d+ triggered but ignored|Host offered)

FastPattern.description: MailTrafficAudit postfix/smtpd 7 TLS connection established from
ServiceWarning postfix/smtpd? 8 improper command pipelining; discarding EHLO keywords
FastPattern.pattern: postfix/smtpd?\[\d+\]: .*(?:improper command pipelining|discarding \S+ keywords|Cannot start TLS: handshake failure)

FastField.defaultValue: Mail queued for delivery to $6 via "$8"

FastPattern.description: ServiceWarning postfix/smtp 8 Peer certficate could not be verified
FastPattern.pattern: postfix/smtp\[\d+\]: Peer certficate could not be verified

FastPattern.description: MailTrafficAudit postfix/smtp - setting up connection to

FastField.defaultValue: Remote mail queued for delivery to $6
Message ID $5 Queued as $11 via relay $8

FastPattern.description: ServiceWarning postfix/cleanup 9 unexpected tag; PBMF file not found
ServiceWarning postfix/sta_scanner 4 unable to load|missing \S+ info
MailTrafficAudit postfix/smtpd - setting up TLS connection from
FastPattern.pattern: postfix/smtpd\[\d+\]: setting up TLS connection from

FastPattern.description: MailTrafficAudit postfix/smtpd - Anonymous TLS connection established from
FastPattern.matcher: ^(\d+) (.*) (postfix/smtpd)(\[\d+\]):\s+(\w+) TLS connection established from [^\[]+\[([^:]+)\]: (\S+) with cipher ([-.\w]+) \(([^)]+)\).*

FastPattern.description: mail, MailTrafficAudit: smtp, host refused to talk
FastPattern.pattern: \d+ [-\w.]+ postfix[-/\w]*/smtp\[\d+\]: [A-F\d_]+: host [-\w.]+\[[\d.]+\] refused to talk to me: \d+

FastField.defaultValue: host "$5" refused to talk to me

FastFormatter.format: host "$6" refused to talk to me

FastFormatter.condition: .+(Comcast .+ Reverse DNS entry\. .+)\. For more information.*

FastFormatter.format: Comcast requires all sending IP addresses have a valid rDNS. This error results when the lookup failed. This error should be treated as a temp-fail and can be retried.

FastPattern.matcher: (\d+) ([-\w.]+) ([-/\w]+)\[\d+\]: ([A-F\d_]+): conversation with ([-\w.]+)\[([\d.]+)\] timed out while receiving the initial server greeting.*
FastPattern.pattern: \d+ [-\w.]+ postfix[-/\w]*/smtp\[\d+\]: [A-F\d_]+: conversation with [-\w.]+\[[\d.]+\] timed out while receiving the initial server greeting

FastField.defaultValue: $4: conversation with $5 timed out while receiving the initial server greeting

FastPattern.description: ServiceWarning postfix/mcafee_av - mcafee virus database has changed
FastPattern.pattern: postfix/mcafee_av\[\d+\]: McAfee virus database has changed

FastPattern.description: ServiceWarning postfix/cleanup - fail to write data; lost connection
NullAlert postfix/<various> - table hash messages; acs_scanner
